amendment.description: Amendment redirects $1,000,000 to fund transitional housing and homelessness services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 268 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to reallocate $1,000,000 to fund transitional housing and homelessness services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A091) Agreed to by recorded vote: 294 - 127 (Roll no. 406).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A091) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A091) Agreed to by recorded vote: 294 - 127 (Roll no. 406).
